blocks.name: iundisjfi
blocks.content: Rewrite a countable union as a disjoint union, finite version. Cf. ~ iundisj . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: iundisj2fi
blocks.content: A disjoint union is disjoint, finite version. Cf. ~ iundisj2 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iundisj2fi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
